# Documentation index: orient yourself fast

> Pick the task you need to finish and jump straight to the right guide.

- [Quickstart](./quickstart.md) — Follow one module from discovery to fixtures and learn watch mode.
- [Cookbook](./cookbook.md) — Apply repeatable recipes for scaling JSON, fixtures, seeds, and plugins.
- [Install guide](./install.md) — Choose pip, Poetry, Hatch, and extras like `orjson`, `regex`, `hypothesis`, `watch`.
- [Configuration reference](./configuration.md) — Review every config key, default, and precedence layer.
- [CLI reference](./cli.md) — Inspect top-level commands, subcommands, and flag defaults.
- [Concepts](./concepts.md) — Understand why determinism, sandboxing, and Pluggy hooks matter.
- [Features at a glance](./features.md) — Explore discovery, generation, emitters, policies, and quality levers.
- [Discovery guide](./discovery.md) — Compare AST vs safe-import and configure sandbox limits.
- [Emitters](./emitters.md) — Learn JSON/JSONL, pytest fixtures, schema emitters, and atomic write behaviour.
- [Providers](./providers.md) & [Strategies](./strategies.md) — Extend generation with new hooks or tweaks.
- [Explain command](./explain.md) — Read tree and JSON outputs to debug generation plans.
- [Seeds](./seeds.md) & [Presets](./presets.md) — Freeze seeds, apply presets, and manage probability policies.
- [Logging](./logging.md) — Emit JSON logs, inspect event schemas, and tune verbosity.
- [Doctor & diagnostics](./doctor.md) — Validate coverage, run diff/check, and harden discovery.
- [Security](./security.md) — Review sandbox guards, exit codes, and safe-import behaviour.
- [Output paths](./output-paths.md) — Use templated destinations and understand the validation rules.
- [API reference](./api.md) — Call `generate_json`, `generate_fixtures`, `generate_schema`, and inspect return types.
- [Alternatives](./alternatives.md) — Compare fixture tooling and pick the right approach.
- [Troubleshooting](./troubleshooting.md) — Decode error taxonomy, fix watch mode, and unblock CI.
- [Architecture](./architecture.md) — Visualise the pipeline and plugin hook flow.

Stay in second-person across docs so you can follow copy-paste ready steps without translation.
